English: Locate a terminal and use the QUERY command to locate the item
Description: Don't localize QUERY, it is a command used in the game's terminals.

French.Translation: Localisez un terminal et utilisez la commande QUERY pour localiser l'objet.

Italian.Translation: Trovare un terminale e usare il comando QUERY per trovare l'oggetto

German.Translation: Lokalisieren Sie ein Terminal und nutzen Sie den Befehl QUERY, um den Gegenstand zu finden.

Spanish.Translation: Encuentra una terminal y usa el comando QUERY para localizar el objeto.

Russian.Translation: Найдите терминал и используйте команду QUERY, чтобы определить положение предмета.

Portuguese_Brazil.Translation: Localize um terminal e use o comando QUERY para localizar o item.

Polish.Translation: Zlokalizuj terminal i użyj polecenia QUERY, aby znaleźć przedmiot.

Japanese.Translation: 端末を見つけてQUERYコマンドを使い、アイテムを探せ

Korean.Translation: 터미널을 찾아 QUERY 명령을 사용해 아이템 찾기

Chinese_Traditional.Translation: 定位終端並使用QUERY指令定位物品

Chinese_Simplified.Translation: 找到一台终端并使用QUERY命令定位物品

name: WardenObjectiveData.RetrieveEssentialItemsMWP_Override.FindLocationInfoHelp
